detail_desc: Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist, decorative ring at the sides and medium coverage at the back.
Fully lined, smocked swimsuit containing glittery threads with a low-cut back. Cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, high-cut legs and medium coverage at the back.
Lightly padded jersey hat in the shape of a strawberry with a felt appliqué on top and elastication around the hem. Lined.
Straight-cut, single-breasted jacket in woven fabric with thin shoulder pads, notch lapels, flap welt front pockets and long sleeves with decorative buttons at the cuffs. Lined.
Straight-cut, single-breasted jacket in woven fabric with thin shoulder pads, notch lapels, flap welt front pockets and long sleeves with decorative buttons at the cuffs. Lined.
Straight-cut, single-breasted jacket in woven fabric with thin shoulder pads, notch lapels, flap welt front pockets and long sleeves with decorative buttons at the cuffs. Lined.

Wedge-heeled sandals in suede with long straps at the top that tie around the ankles, jute heel caps and a braided jute trim around the soles. Imitation leather insoles. Platform front 2.5 cm. Heel 9 cm.

Wedge-heeled sandals in suede with long straps at the top that tie around the ankles, jute heel caps and a braided jute trim around the soles. Imitation leather insoles. Platform front 2.5 cm. Heel 9 cm.
Non-wired bras in soft cotton jersey with lace. Padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Swim shorts in recycled polyester with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket. Soft mesh inner shorts.

Briefs in jersey made from a cotton blend designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin. Mid waist, lined gusset, low-cut legs and full coverage at the back.
Lined, non-wired triangle bikini top with ties at the back and back of the neck and cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support.
Lined, non-wired triangle bikini top with ties at the back and back of the neck and cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support.
Lined, non-wired triangle bikini top with ties at the back and back of the neck and cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support.
Lined, non-wired triangle bikini top with ties at the back and back of the neck and cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support.
Trainers in mesh with imitation leather details, glittery sections, elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Strapless bandeau bra in lace. Jersey-lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, and a wide lace trim at the hem. No fasteners.
Strapless bandeau bra in lace. Jersey-lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, and a wide lace trim at the hem. No fasteners.

Short skirt in cotton twill with a zip fly, button at the waist, front pockets and flap patch pockets at the sides. Unlined.
Short skirt in cotton twill with a zip fly, button at the waist, front pockets and flap patch pockets at the sides. Unlined.
Short skirt in cotton twill with a zip fly, button at the waist, front pockets and flap patch pockets at the sides. Unlined.
Thong briefs in lace and mesh with a low waist and lined gusset.
Thong briefs in lace and mesh with a low waist and lined gusset.

Leggings in jersey with an elasticated waist, sewn-in creases at the front and a zip and concealed button at one side.
Leggings in jersey with an elasticated waist, sewn-in creases at the front and a zip and concealed button at one side.
Straight-style top in soft slub jersey made from organic cotton. Round neckline with a narrow ribbed trim, and flutter sleeves.
Straight-style top in soft slub jersey made from organic cotton. Round neckline with a narrow ribbed trim, and flutter sleeves.

Trainers in imitation leather with elasticated lacing at the front, an adjustable hook and loop tab at the top, and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and transparent soles with motion-activated flashing LED lights in various colours.
Sandals made from patterned polyester that is partly recycled. Adjustable straps with a hook and loop fastening across the foot and ankle and around the heel. Moulded insoles and fluted soles.
Pyjamas with a T-shirt and pair of shorts in soft cotton jersey. Wide T-shirt with dropped shoulders and slits in the sides. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Pyjamas with a T-shirt and pair of shorts in soft cotton jersey. Wide T-shirt with dropped shoulders and slits in the sides. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch, flexible denim for maximum comfort with a high waist, zip fly and button and straight, wide legs. Adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y).
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch, flexible denim for maximum comfort with a high waist, zip fly and button and straight, wide legs. Adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y).
Wide waist belt with a round metal buckle. Width approx. 5 cm.
Wide waist belt with a round metal buckle. Width approx. 5 cm.
Ankle-length sports trousers in a crisp nylon weave. High waist with wide, covered elastication and a drawstring, diagonal side pockets and tapered legs.

Popover jacket in a crisp, shimmering metallic nylon weave. Mesh-lined hood with an elastic drawstring, a zip at the top with a chin guard, and a loose, ventilating yoke at the back. Long raglan sleeves with wide elastication at the cuffs, a kangaroo pocket and a concealed, elasticated drawstring at the hem. Mesh lining.
Shirt in washed, stretch denim with a collar, press-studs down the front and flap chest pockets with a press-stud. Long sleeves with press-studs at the cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
Fitted thong body in ribbed jersey with a slight sheen. Square neckline, long puff sleeves and press-studs at the crotch.
Fitted thong body in ribbed jersey with a slight sheen. Square neckline, long puff sleeves and press-studs at the crotch.
Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with covered elastication at the waist. Tapered legs with open pockets and covered elastication at the hems.
Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with covered elastication at the waist. Tapered legs with open pockets and covered elastication at the hems.

Sandals in patterned ethylene-vinyl acetate with a small loop at the back and straps with hook and loop fasteners. Lined in jersey made from recycled polyester. Moulded insoles with a textured pattern to give the feet a better grip, and patterned soles.

Sandals in patterned ethylene-vinyl acetate with a small loop at the back and straps with hook and loop fasteners. Lined in jersey made from recycled polyester. Moulded insoles with a textured pattern to give the feet a better grip, and patterned soles.

Fully lined bikini bottoms. Mid waist with wide elastication, overlocked edges around the legs and cutaway coverage at the back.

Straight-cut shirt in a soft weave with a collar, V-neck opening and buttons down the front. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Short skirt in sturdy cotton twill. High paper bag waist with wide, covered elastication, a zip fly and two buttons, and large flap patch pockets at the sides. Unlined.

T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a text print and sequins. Narrow trim around the neckline and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.

Sleeveless, ribbed jersey jumpsuit in a straight cut at the top with narrow shoulder straps. Seam at the waist and wide, 3/4-length legs. Lined at the top.
Sleeveless, ribbed jersey jumpsuit in a straight cut at the top with narrow shoulder straps. Seam at the waist and wide, 3/4-length legs. Lined at the top.
Fitted sports vest top in ribbed, fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back.

Lined, non-wired bikini top with adjustable shoulder straps and cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. No fasteners. The polyester content of the bikini top’s outer fabric is partly recycled. The polyester content of the lining is recycled.
